Details.d1: ▪ Accelerated development and achieved an early release for a 5-month Tableau dashboards project by 45 days with high quality, reducing the rework time from 20% to 10%
Details.d2: ▪ Managed stakeholder’s relationship and fostered open conversation by hosting requirements sessions and demo sessions to interview stakeholders, reveal potential problems, and provide multiple alternative solutions
Details.d3: ▪ Reduced the time of populating data from 25 different excels into data mart by 80% via building an ETL pipeline in Python. Dramatically saved the effort of unit testing and lowered the bug rate with self-build metrics
Details.d4: ▪ Visualized essentials metrics for a government bureau to reduce the report process time from a month to a few seconds, facilitating operational activities, leadership update, and informational presentation
Details.d5: ▪ 2020 Going the Extra Mile (GEM) Award Winner

Details.d1: ▪ Developed multi-touch attribution model through Markov Chain using Python and Alteryx to understand media mix efficiency, helping clients to improve their return on investment by an estimation of 10%
Details.d2: ▪ Utilized cohort analysis to understand customer journey of different segments, providing targeted marketing strategies (e.g., improve the conversion rate of new customers and customer retention rate)
Details.d3: Collected client’s requirements, led a team of six to search 20+ papers, drafted project roadmap and reprioritized it based on client’s needs, delivering solutions to measure media effectiveness with interactive visualizations

Details.d1: ▪ Led quarterly and annual reports and implemented internal documentation, increasing informed decision-making
Details.d2: ▪ Built and maintained Tableau dashboard of data collected from 20+ social media platforms, improving audience-targeting for proposals of marketing resource allocation

Details.d1: ▪ Interviewed with trainees and made study plans; regular one-on-one interaction to enable every trainee to complete their learning progress and achieve study goal
Details.d2: ▪ Held weekly tutoring sessions; answered trainees’ questions and provided suggestions

Details.d2: ▪ Monitored permitted instruments and assisted team in risk control of credit spread

Details.d1: ▪ Co-launched a philanthropic project for poverty-stricken hearing loss children
Details.d2: ▪ Investigated on 534 potential cooperative enterprises resulting in contact information of 144 enterprises for donor possibilities
